name: Flooring Care
description: Extend the life of your carpets, hardwood, and tile.

templates.name: Deep Clean Carpets
instructions: Vacuum thoroughly first.
Pre-treat stains.
Use a carpet cleaner (rented or owned) with hot water extraction.
Do not over-wet the carpet.
Use fans to speed up drying.

templates.name: Polish Hardwood Floors
templates.description: Restore shine and protect the finish.
instructions: Clear the room of furniture.
Clean the floor thoroughly to remove all dust.
Apply floor polish in an S-pattern.
Spread evenly with a microfiber mop.
Wait 24 hours before replacing heavy furniture.

templates.name: Seal Tile Grout
templates.description: Prevent staining and water absorption in grout lines.
instructions: Clean grout lines thoroughly and let dry.
Apply sealer using a brush or applicator bottle.
Wipe excess sealer off tiles immediately.
Let cure for 24-48 hours.

name: Walls & Paint
description: Keep your home's interior looking fresh.

templates.name: Touch-up Paint Inspection
templates.description: Fix scuffs and chips on walls.
instructions: Walk through high-traffic areas.
Clean scuffs with a magic eraser first.
Dab matching paint onto chips or scratches.
Feather the edges to blend.

templates.name: Clean Baseboards & Trim
templates.description: Remove dust and grime from woodwork.
instructions: Vacuum with a brush attachment to remove loose dust.
Wipe down with a damp cloth and mild soap.
Dry with a clean towel.
Use a dryer sheet to repel future dust.

templates.name: Lubricate Window Tracks
templates.description: Ensure windows open and close smoothly.
instructions: Vacuum dirt from tracks.
Spray silicone lubricant into the tracks (avoid oil-based).
Open and close the window several times.
Wipe up excess spray.

templates.name: Test Carbon Monoxide Detectors
instructions: Press and hold the test button.
Listen for 4 beeps.
Check the expiration date on the back.
Replace batteries if needed.
